name: InfracostSetup
description: Sets up Infracost CLI in Azure Pipelines. Show cloud cost estimates for Terraform in pull requests.
author: Infracost

inputs.name: apiKey
inputs.label: API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Your Infracost API key. It can be retrieved by running `infracost configure get api_key`. We recommend using your same API key in all environments. If you don't have one, download Infracost (https://www.infracost.io/docs/#quick-start) and run `infracost auth login` to get a free API key.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Version of Infracost CLI to install. SemVer ranges (https://www.npmjs.com/package/semver#ranges) are supported.
    required: false
    default: 0.10.x

inputs.name: currency
inputs.label: Currency
inputs.helpMarkDown: Convert output from USD to your preferred ISO 4217 currency (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#Active_codes), e.g. EUR, BRL or INR.

inputs.name: pricingApiEndpoint
inputs.label: Pricing API Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: **Only needed for self-hosted users** (https://www.infracost.io/docs/cloud_pricing_api/self_hosted), endpoint of the Cloud Pricing API, e.g. https://cloud-pricing-api.
